About Me

BIO

I am Bhumi Kachhiya. I'm UI/UX Designer, Front end Developer and Wordpress/shopify Developer life long learner, and ready for new opportunities.

I believe in user centered design and delivering the best possible experience to people. I have experience with following technology

I was Representative of Madhuben & Bhanubhai Patel Institute of Technology 2019-2020. I also have experience in Non-technical field like Management , Speaker and Leadership. I worked as Secretary of ISTE MBIT SB and lead whole team since 2018 with 250+ members continuously 2 years. Also handle 20+ events as coordinator and volunteering in 35+ events.
